title: give some information of the app name in the popup of appdicator
body:
For example:

could you change "Open" to "Open Teams for Linux"
or change "About" to "About Teams for Linux"

so we can get the name of the app, especially when the tray icon is not clear or we are not familiar with the icon.


![image](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/27529/508fe038-f86c-44c5-82bc-f4d7a1911a48)
